text: SSSR may refer to: *Soyuz Sovetskikh Sotsialisticheskikh Respublik, the Latin alphabet transliteration of Союз Советских Социалистических Республик (CCCP), the Cyrillic name of the Soviet Union *Society for the Scientific Study of Reading, a learned society promoting the study of reading and literacy *Society for the Scientific Study of Religion, a learned society for social scientific perspective on religious institutions and experiences *Smallest Set of Smallest Rings, a cheminformatics term for the minimal cycle basis of a molecular graph
title: SSSR
